message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product holds immense value to you, worth $100, and we're extending an exclusive opportunity to purchase it directly from us. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to propose a special introductory price of $95 for you. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly exceptional at a fantastic deal.
